subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: While much of the focus was on Montreal’s goaltenders, Henrik Lundqvist continued to exorcise his Bell Centre demons and stopped 40 shots to help New York to a 2-0 series lead.
snippet: While much of the focus was on Montreal’s goaltenders, Henrik Lundqvist continued to exorcise his Bell Centre demons and stopped 40 shots to help New York to a 2-0 series lead.
